response.original_title: Mumford & Sons Live from Voodoo Fest, New Orleans 2018
response.overview: If you gazed heavenward on opening day of the 2018 Voodoo Music + Arts Experience, it was all blue skies and brilliant horizons. If you looked down, it was a sloppy, shoe-sucking, all-consuming mess. The members of Mumford & Sons, Friday nightâ€™s main stage closer at the City Park Festival Grounds, were clearly looking up as they aimed, and largely managed, to elevate all in attendance.
response.title: Mumford & Sons Live from Voodoo Fest, New Orleans 2018
